name: REFLECTIONS
summary:
This is our graduation film from Bezalel - Academy of art and design, Jerusalem 2013 
　　This is the story of Barnie, a grown man, Play around with his childish reflection in an urban landscape. 
　　But the fun comes to an end when other adults around change him, and turn him into one of them. 
　　*The film was made with TVPaint 9.5, Photoshop and After effects cs6. 
　　We hope you'll enjoy it! :)
